messages.subject: Lexie, my sweet girl
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/1/2003 7:19:05 AM Central Daylight Time, ... Or chalk it up to the fact that some of us have lower thresholds of anger!! ... I had a
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/1/2003 7:19:05 AM Central Daylight Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
> Also, we obviously need to work on her temper--or should I just
> chalk this up to a stressful weekend, she's in her first play, not
> enough sleep, she has a cold, etc.

Or chalk it up to the fact that some of us have lower thresholds of anger!!
:)
I had a strong will and quick temper my entire life...something I am still
learning about.
I hit a girl in High school because she was taunting me and wouldn't
stop....some people just need longer to aquire skills for walking away or diffusing
bad situations.
Sounds like it all ended up ok, and HEY, she's only 8.
I didn't have the skills for solving problems peaceably until late in my teen
years and still have to think really hard to not lose my temper.

She's young, she has a strong personality and she learned something from
this.
Let it go, that's what I think.

Ren


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
